alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 2:00PM CDT until June 10 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs. Low lying areas in Riverview Park experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has fallen below flood stage this afternoon, and continue to fall through Monday afternoon. However, the river will slowly begin to rise again starting Monday evening and will reach the flood stage of 15.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
